_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Different cases of inviting an ascetic o: They fail to give what’s requested
They give what’s requested, but don’t meet expectations
They give what’s requested, meeting expectations
They give what’s requested, exceeding expectations.
